titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress regarding the establishment of a Parents Week to recognize and support parents who actively participate in the lives of their children.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Civil Service and Agency Organization.

bill.summary: 7/16/2001--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that a Parents Week should be established to recognize and support parents who actively participate in the lives of their children.
